name: SortPuz - Water Puzzles Games
description:
SortPuz is a simple, fun and addictive color sorting game! The game can not only exercise logical thinking, but also relieve stress.

• Operation: Tap any tube to pour water into another tube.
• Rule: You need to pour water of different colors into tubes to convert each other until each tube is filled with only one color of water.
• Difficulty: The difficulty will increase as the level is upgraded.
• Tip: There must be enough space on the tube to pour water.

If you have any questions, please contact our support staff
E-mail address: nannanyouxi2000@sina.com
We will deal with all kinds of problems you encounter in the game in a timely manner.
